verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer, <S%H8605><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> Let my cry <S%H7775><s%> come to you. <S%H935><s%>

Don't <S%H5641><s%> hide your face <S%H6440><s%> from me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my distress. <S%H6862><s%> Turn <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> to me. <S%H6030><s%> Answer me quickly <S%H4118><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when I call. <S%H7121><s%>
For my days <S%H3117><s%> consume <S%H3615><s%> away like smoke. <S%H6227><s%> My bones <S%H6106><s%> are burned <S%H2787><s%> as a torch. <S%H4168><s%>
My heart <S%H3820><s%> is blighted <S%H5221><s%> like grass, <S%H6212><s%> and withered, <S%H3001><s%> for I forget <S%H7911><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> my bread. <S%H3899><s%>
By reason of the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my groaning, <S%H585><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> stick to my skin. <S%H1320><s%>
I am like <S%H1819><s%> a pelican <S%H6893><s%> of the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%> I have become as an owl <S%H3563><s%> of the waste places. <S%H2723><s%>
I watch, <S%H8245><s%> and have become like a sparrow <S%H6833><s%> that is alone <S%H909><s%> on the housetop. <S%H1406><s%>
My enemies <S%H341><s%> reproach <S%H2778><s%> me all day. <S%H3117><s%> Those who are mad <S%H1984><s%> at me use my name as a curse. <S%H7650><s%>
For I have eaten <S%H398><s%> ashes <S%H665><s%> like bread, <S%H3899><s%> and mixed <S%H4537><s%> my drink <S%H8249><s%> with tears, <S%H1065><s%>
Because <S%H6440><s%> of your indignation <S%H2195><s%> and your wrath, <S%H7110><s%> for you have taken me up, <S%H5375><s%> and thrown me away. <S%H7993><s%>
My days <S%H3117><s%> are like a long <S%H5186><s%> shadow. <S%H6738><s%> I have withered <S%H3001><s%> like grass. <S%H6212><s%>
But you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, will remain <S%H3427><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> your renown endures <S%H3427><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>
You will arise <S%H6965><s%> and have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on Zion; <S%H6726><s%> for it is time <S%H6256><s%> to have pity <S%H2603><s%> on her. <S%H4150><s%> Yes, the set time has come. <S%H935><s%>
For your servants <S%H5650><s%> take pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in her stones, <S%H68><s%> and have pity <S%H2603><s%> on her dust. <S%H6083><s%>
So the nations <S%H1471><s%> will fear <S%H3372><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> all the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> your glory. <S%H3519><s%>
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has built up <S%H1129><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%> He has appeared <S%H7200><s%> in his glory. <S%H3519><s%>
He has responded <S%H6437><s%> to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of the destitute, <S%H6199><s%> and has not despised <S%H959><s%> their prayer. <S%H8605><s%>
This will be written <S%H3789><s%> for the generation <S%H1755><s%> to come. <S%H314><s%> A people <S%H5971><s%> which will be created <S%H1254><s%> will praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah. <S%H3050><s%>
For he has looked down <S%H8259><s%> from the height <S%H4791><s%> of his sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%> From heaven, <S%H8064><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H5027><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%>
to hear <S%H8085><s%> the groans <S%H603><s%> of the prisoner; <S%H615><s%> to free <S%H6605><s%> those who are condemned <S%H1121><s%> to death; <S%H8546><s%>
that men may declare <S%H5608><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and his praise <S%H8416><s%> in Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%>
when the peoples <S%H5971><s%> are gathered <S%H6908><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> the kingdoms, <S%H4467><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
He weakened <S%H6031><s%> my strength <S%H3581><s%> along the course. <S%H1870><s%> He shortened <S%H7114><s%> my days. <S%H3117><s%>

I said, <S%H559><s%> "My God, <S%H410><s%> don't <S%H5927><s%> take me away in the midst <S%H2677><s%> of my days. <S%H3117><s%> Your years <S%H8141><s%> are throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>
Of old, <S%H6440><s%> you laid the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> The heavens <S%H8064><s%> are the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands. <S%H3027><s%>

They will perish, <S%H6><s%> but you will endure. <S%H5975><s%> Yes, <S%H1086><s%> all of them will wear out like a garment. <S%H899><s%> You will change <S%H2498><s%> them like a cloak, <S%H3830><s%> and they will be changed. <S%H2498><s%>
But you are the same. <S%H8141><s%> Your years will have no end. <S%H8552><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of your servants <S%H5650><s%> will continue. <S%H7931><s%> Their seed <S%H2233><s%> will be established <S%H3559><s%> before you. <S%H6440><s%>"
